des:
"This works well on any cake, pours nicely and looks beautiful. This recipe makes enough to glaze one 9x13-inch cake. 
Works on any cake."
ins: Combine confectioner's sugar, milk, vegetable oil, cocoa powder, corn syrup, and vanilla extract together in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until glaze is smooth and hot, 2 to 3 minutes. Do not boil.
